item.title: CVE-2024-31239|2024-06-04T17:37:00.932Z -- nudgify -- nudgify%20social%20proof%2C%20sales%20popup%20%26%20fomo
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Nudgify Nudgify Social Proof, Sales Popup & FOMO.This issue affects Nudgify Social Proof, Sales Popup & FOMO: from n/a through 1.3.3.
